# Rooms

There are three types of rooms in this mystery

When moving to an empty space roll a d6 to determine the type of room encountered:

-   1-3: Short story
-   4-5: Writing rule
-   6: Novel

Then roll to determine which room:

| d6  | Short story (1-3) | Writing rule (4-5) | Novel (6) |
|-----|-------------------|--------------------|-----------|
| 1   | Foie gras         |                    |           |
| 2   | San-nakji         |                    |           |
| 3   | Shark fin soup    |                    |           |
| 4   | Civet cats        |                    |           |
| 5   | Horse             |                    |           |
| 6   |                   |                    |           |
